1370: Abben moved to Lange gracht.C.2 after marriage.
Got married to Eingeliadis at age 24 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Riet, at age 25.
1374: Had a son with Eingeliadis, Gerlacus, at age 28.
1375: Had a son with Eingeliadis, Gherbrandus, at age 29.
1379: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Iris, at age 33.
1387: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Liedelde, at age 41.
1388: Had a daughter with Eingeliadis, Marisseis, at age 42.
Lost daughter Iris when Iris was 10 years old.
